resources.string:
-NOTICE: To add/remove screens press MENU/Edit

-NOTICE: To enable ORIENTATION, disable PERSISTENCE.

-REMEMBER: You can hide apps from the drawer by using the custom catalogs (press menu key while the drawer is open)

Version 1.1.5:
--------------
-Small layout change, ask your theme developers to update their themes!!!.
-Fixed some weird effects when removing apps from desktop.
-Desktop previews now fill the available space.
-Fix the "Crop" option for custom shortcuts.
-Update scrollable widgets API to r45.
-Translations
-Minor fixes
